name: @ic-reactor/parser
description: A parser for the DFINITY Candid language
author: b3hr4d

scripts.build:node: npx rimraf src/pkg dist && wasm-pack build --no-pack --target nodejs --out-dir src/pkg && npx tsc && cp -r src/pkg dist
scripts.build:browser: npx rimraf src/pkg dist && wasm-pack build --no-pack --target web --out-dir src/pkg && npx tsc && cp -r src/pkg dist
scripts.build: npx rimraf src/pkg dist && wasm-pack build --no-pack --out-dir src/pkg && npx tsc && cp -r src/pkg dist
